channel.title: DeNS PowerDNS Integration on DeNS
channel.description: Recent content in DeNS PowerDNS Integration on DeNS

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: The executable dens-pdns-backend-cli is a remote backend to PowerDNS which facilitates propagating RRs stored in DeNS Queryâ€™s database to PowerDNS so traditional DNS resolvers are able to transitvely query the blockchain for RRs. In the git repository, it is provided at the flake output dens-pdns-backend, so Nix users can enter a shell with the dens-pdns-backend-cli executable with the following command. nix shell github:mlabs-haskell/DeNS#dens-pdns-backend When dens-pdns-backend-cli executes, it needs the following environment variables set.
This section describes dens-pdns-backend-cli which is a PowerDNS backend so RRs on the blockchain can be propagated to traditional DNS resolvers.
